name: Depart - Pixel Prototype Week 7
description:
Controls:

Walk: Arrows

Place Bone: Z

Sleep: X

Made in one week in Bennett Foddy's Pixel Prototype Studio class at NYU.

This week's theme: make a game based off of a song Bennett made.  I made a game about spring coming which accidentally turned out to be about climate change ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Read more about the development here.
